subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: After a 2-0 win against Azerbaijan in San Francisco, the United States’ World Cup team will spend a day in New York ahead of Sunday’s match against Turkey.
snippet: After a 2-0 win against Azerbaijan in San Francisco, the United States’ World Cup team will spend a day in New York ahead of Sunday’s match against Turkey.
